timeline.message:
Expose enough so ChunkGenerator can be created.

This is only scratching the surface, true magic comes when Biome can be built as a custom one (fully supported by Vanilla) as well as exposing the ability to implement the NoiseGenerator or even the ChunkGenerator outside the Vanilla system (something I'd like to do but far down the road)

Still missing some builders and factories to proceed to implementation.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

timeline.author: dualspiral

+package org.spongepowered.api.world.generation.settings;
+
+import org.spongepowered.api.block.BlockState;
+import org.spongepowered.api.util.CopyableBuilder;
+import org.spongepowered.api.world.generation.settings.noise.NoiseSettings;
+import org.spongepowered.api.world.generation.settings.structure.StructureGenerationSettings;
+
+public interface NoiseGeneratorSettings extends ChunkGeneratorSettings {
+
+    NoiseSettings noiseSettings();
+
+    BlockState defaultBlock();
+
+    BlockState defaultFluid();
+
+    int bedrockRoofY();
+
+    int bedrockFloorY();
+
+    int sealLevel();

timeline.message:
More ease of use to follow our standards.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

Settings -> Config for World Generation.

More API fixes.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

Settings -> Config for World Generation.

More API fixes.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

Settings -> Config for World Generation.

More API fixes.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

Restructure the World API into a template system.

This is by far an in-complete representation of the power of the Minecraft world gen system now available in 1.16.4 but it is enough to allow Sponge to load worlds via template files without enforcing other implementations to do so.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

Various World API changes

- add `keepLoaded` to templates/properties.
- add `referenced` to RegistryReference
- ConstructWorldPropertiesEvent is always server-only

...and other minor changes.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

Define long term API method strategy (or start too)

- Add "defaultWorld" to WorldManager.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>

Add a configuration system for complex biome providers.

Signed-off-by: Chris Sanders <zidane@spongepowered.org>
